cab.content: (Thts Document Is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty'3 Qovernmern )12inS. , C RE TcBATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 6th JUNE, 19181, French and American troops attacked between NEUILLY-LA-POTERIE and rOUSSIERES., north west of CHATEAU-THIERRY, over 100 prisoners have been taken and the attack is progressing.There Ms bo en heavy bombardment betv/eon RHEIMS and JON QUERY and the enemy attacked south west of ST .EUPHRAISE, but the result is not yet known * Deserters from 3 divisions state that an attack on the NO YON - MONTDIDIER front is imminent and aerial reconnaissances carried out last night revealed many bivouac fires and much movement in the area ROYJE - LASSIGNY -NO YON.2* Last night the enemy made a local attack capturingthe LOCKE HOSPICE, so far the French have not succeeded in re-taking this place.36. On the rest of the British front the situation isunchanged.General Staff,war Office,' S.W.I.6 th June, 1918 oIssued at 6*35 pwru*.fIts- iirfopmation[wisler only,
